annotations.description: It Ain't The Holidays Without Milk Punch! Milk Punch is a precolonial Holiday Staple although it is very very popular, still, in New Orleans. The first time ...
annotations.title: Milk Punch - A Holiday Classic from 1688!

textContent:
4oz (120ml) Whole Milk
1oz (30ml) Brandy
.5oz (15ml) Virgin Island Rum
.375oz (11ml) Simple Syrup
2 Dashes Vanilla Extract
Grated Nutmeg Garnish

Shake and double strain into wine glass or tumbler

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lkNNlsunrTM
title: Milk Punch
